item.title: Privacy - no more user tracking
item.author: markus@petzsch.eu (Markus Petzsch)
item.description: Privacy for my users: No more Analytics on my Websites Just a short info: I’ve decided to remove the Matomo tracking code from my websites. I value my own privacy when surfing online and so it occured to me, that I should respect the privacy of my users just the same. I’m also thinking of replacing the DISQUS feature as it also includes way to many privacy traps (aka social networks).
